title: kANa vENDAmO
sahitya:
kANa vENDAmO iru kaNNirukkum pOdE viNNuyar gOpuram


anupallavi

  vINil ulagai shuTri shuTri vandAl mEdini pOTrum cidambara dEvanaik-


caraNam 1    vaiyattinilE karuppaiyuL kiDanduLLam naiyap-piravAmal aiyan tiru naTam
  caraNam 2    OTTai shaDalam oDunga veTrelumbuk-kUTTil irunduyir OTTam piDikkumun
